Items.Title: Oversight - Efforts to Evaluate and Remediate Wrongful Conviction Claims.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Efforts to Evaluate and Remediate Wrongful Conviction Claims.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A. 127/S. 1738, to prohibit prosecutors from using creative expression as evidence against a criminal defendant without clear and convincing proof that there is a literal, factual nexus between the creative expression and the facts of the case
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: To prohibit prosecutors from using creative expression as evidence against a criminal defendant without clear and convincing proof that there is a literal, factual nexus between the creative expression and the facts of the case (A. 127/S. 1738).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign S1774, in relation to forensic DNA testing and to request certain DNA test comparisons.
Items.MatterName: Forensic DNA testing and to request certain DNA test comparisons (S1774).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign S5824/A6860, in relation to claims for unjust conviction and imprisonment.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Claims for unjust conviction and imprisonment (S5824/A6860).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign S4855/A5344, in relation to retroactively adjusting the compensation of formerly incarcerated individuals who were unjustly convicted.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Retroactively adjusting the compensation of formerly incarcerated individuals who were unjustly convicted (S4855/A5344).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign S4812/A5269A, in relation to the return of fines, restitution and reparation payments where there was an unjust conviction, in a timely manner.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Return of fines, restitution and reparation payments where there was an unjust conviction, in a timely manner (S4812/A5269A).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign S.4795/A.5959, requiring at least one member of the State Board of Parole be a formerly incarcerated person.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring at least one member of the State Board of Parole be a formerly incarcerated person (S.4795/A.5959).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.206-A/A.1432-A, which would remove the lifetime ban on jury duty for convicted felons and postpone jury service for any person currently incarcerated for a felony.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Remove the lifetime ban on jury duty for convicted felons and postpone jury service for any person currently incarcerated for a felony (S.206-A/A.1432-A).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.3103-B/A.6058-A, to require mental health services for incarcerated individuals with mental health issues related to the trauma of incarceration.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Require mental health services for incarcerated individuals with mental health issues related to the trauma of incarceration (S.3103-B/A.6058-A).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign S1774, in relation to forensic DNA testing and to request certain DNA test comparisons.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Forensic DNA testing and to request certain DNA test comparisons (S1774).
